attributes.action: Give students the choice to continue online lessons or attend school in person
attributes.background: There is a divide in schools about going back and staying at home and it should be the students choice. If they feel comfortable to go to school then they have the option to do so however If they dont no one should pressure them into going and if they feel comfortable and prefer online learning.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Require schools to provide online classes as an option to all children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575392
